name: Declare as Static all methods not using instance members
description: All methods that don't use instance fields and/or methods will be reported except if they have been extended in a subclass or inherit from their parents.
output:
This report lists all non-static methods that don't use any instance fields.
It provides the following information:  Method Full Name
rationale:
When an object is created:
    * Memory is allocated to all the fields
    * All super class fields are also allocated memory
    * All sub class fields, super class fields are initialized .
    * The constructor is invoked.

Using a static avoid to create an object that takes resources when it is unnecessary.
total: The number of non static methods.
